description.brief: A master practitioner of the Path of Mist Walking who can perceive and travel between different states of being across the Nine Realms.
description.physical: Of medium height with pale blue eyes that seem to shift focus between different layers of reality. Her hair is dark brown with silver streaks that appeared during her first realm-crossing.
description.personality: Intensely curious about the nature of existence, patient with students but impatient with those who refuse to see beyond surface appearances. Known for her ability to explain complex mystical concepts in practical terms.

background.summary: Born in a small Midgard village, Astrid discovered her ability to perceive the Mist during a childhood encounter with realm-travelers, leading to her training in the mystical arts.

history.event: First Mist Vision - saw through the veil between realms
Began training at the Mist-Walker Academy
Achieved Path Master status in Mist Walking

relationships.description: Her first teacher in the mystical arts, master of the Path of Divine Order
Promising apprentice currently learning basic Mist perception
Ancient guardian who taught her advanced realm-crossing techniques

abilities.name: Veil Piercing
abilities.description: Can see through the Mist's veils to perceive hidden truths and alternative states of being

abilities.name: State-Walking
abilities.description: Can shift between different states of existence, becoming partially incorporeal or multi-dimensional

abilities.name: Realm-Stepping
abilities.description: Can travel between the Nine Realms by following Mist currents through Yggdrasil's branches

abilities.name: Mystery Comprehension
abilities.description: Can understand paradoxes and impossible phenomena by accepting multiple contradictory truths simultaneously

quotes.text: The Mist shows us not what is, but what could be. Wisdom lies in understanding the difference.
quotes.context: Teaching advanced students about perception and reality
quotes.source: Lectures from the Mist Gardens, Volume II

quotes.text: Every boundary is an invitation to cross it. Every veil is a doorway waiting to be opened.
quotes.context: Before her first journey to Niflheim
